thread.title: adidas Drops the PureBOOST LTD in a Stealthy Triple-Black Colorway
thread.title_full: adidas Drops the PureBOOST LTD in a Stealthy Triple-Black Colorway

author: Adam Mark
title: adidas Drops the PureBOOST LTD in a Stealthy Triple-Black Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Brand: adidas 
Model: PureBOOST LTD 
Key Features: Ultra lightweight Primeknit upper, anchored lace loops, reinforced heel counter, and an all-black PureBOOST sole unit. 
Release Date: Available now 
Price: $160 
Availability: Available online at adidas and select retailers worldwide. 
Editor’s Notes: Following an official release earlier this year, German sportswear giant adidas recently unveiled a brand new take on its lauded PureBOOST LTD silhouette. Released in a triple-black colorway for the upcoming Spring/Summer season, the latest addition to adidas’s long line of BOOST products features many of the design sensibilities popularized by earlier models . 
For more adidas-related news, keep your eyes open for the upcoming NMD_R2 , expected to release this April.
